titles.title: Star Trek Discovery
titles.description: Discovery races against bounty hunters to protect an ancient artifact.

titles.title: Transformers: Rise of the Beasts
titles.description: Optimus Prime and the Autobots take on their biggest challenge yet.

titles.title: Halo
titles.description: Survivors from battle return to Reach. John confronts Dr. Halsey, and the lies of his past.

titles.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
titles.description: A yellow sponge named SpongeBob SquarePants lives in a pineapple with his pet snail, Gary, in the city of Bikini Bottom on the floor of the Pacific Ocean.

titles.title: Mean Girls
titles.description: New student Cady Heron gets welcomed into the top of the social food chain by an elite group of popular girls called the Plastics, ruled by the conniving queen bee Regina George. However, when Cady makes the major misstep of falling for Regina's ex-boyfriend, she soon finds herself caught in their crosshairs.

titles.title: Mayor of Kingstown
titles.description: Meet the McLusky family, power brokers in Kingstown, Michigan, where the business of incarceration is the only thriving industry.Starring: Jeremy Renner, Dianne Wiest, Hugh Dillon, Tobi Bamtefa, Taylor Handley

titles.title: Transformers: Rise of the Beasts
titles.description: Optimus Prime and the Autobots take on their biggest challenge yet.
